price: 57 par ton Seigneur qui les comblera ainsi de Ses faveurs. Voilà le bonheur suprême.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
